name: RABBITMAIDEN~SOFTBOOK ~special edition~
description:
RABBITMAIDEN~SOFTBOOK is a companion visual novel to the mainline rabbitmaiden softworks vns (e.g. heartlovepowertemple) ..

~~ FEATURES ~~

  CREATE ~ bunny dress up game with a large range of  changable options in 13 categories  
DATA ~ interactive library with information about the universe of rabbitmaiden softworks
QUIZ ~ interactive diagnosis questionaire to determine your alignment out of the 3 in-universe elements (life,blood, or depth?)
STORY ~ a short episodic vn about psychicupkeepchibi v1 GUAVA and her internal struggle

~~ SPECIAL EDITION BONUSES ~~

purchasing the special edition will grant you additional files to download.. files include:

   HEARTLOVEPOWERTEMPLE full resolution cgs that are not in original game files (800x600 --> 4000x4000 +) & concept art/sketches

HEARTLOVEPOWERTEMPLE full resolution sprites (2046x3000) for all characters

custom desktop icon + desktop backgrounds

sl videos and other stuff...

**note: subscribing to https://www.patreon.com/yogurt200 for 3dollars or more grants access to **rabbitmaiden softbook patreon edition**, with download only to the vn free for patrons...

web: https://yogurt200.com/rabbitmaidensoft/softbook.html

sound credit: teamCPU , heoliene

*
